name: Square 99: Block Puzzle Sudoku
description:
Square Block Puzzle 99 is a combination of sudoku and block puzzle games. Square Block Puzzle 99 has you match different-shaped blocks in horizontal, vertical or designated 3x3 grids to clear them and aim for the highest score as much as possible.

- Clear the lines & squares to score
- Free & easy to play - Hard to master
- Addictive gameplay. Play it when you are bored or want to train your brain – any time, anywhere.
